sentences.en: As I am regretting the advent of dark, the Yangtze discloses a new night - time enchantment.
sentences.cn: 当我正为夜色降临而惋惜的时候,黑夜里的长江却向我展开另外一种魅力.

sentences.en: At times the enchantment has been modified for a special occasion.
sentences.cn: 这个魔法在特殊的场合被不时修改.

sentences.en: Beyond the platform there was more enchantment.
sentences.cn: 在平台外面还有更迷人的东西呢.

sentences.en: Blue and green dragonflies, poised in the air, added to the enchantment.
sentences.cn: 蓝蜻蜒,绿蜻蜒停在空中, 一动也不动,这更增加了这里的神秘气氛.

sentences.en: Dancing has lost all its enchantment for her.
sentences.cn: 她已完全失去跳舞的乐趣.

sentences.en: He composed heroic songs and began to write many a tale of enchantment and knightly adventure.
sentences.cn: 他谱写英雄短歌并着手编写不少记叙巫术和骑士历险的故事.

sentences.en: She was stripped of all enchantment now.
sentences.cn: 她现在已经失去了一切迷人的力量.

sentences.en: The active enchantment reaches my dust.
sentences.cn: 大自然生动的魅力触及到了我的肢体.

sentences.en: The beauty of the scene filled us with enchantment.
sentences.cn: 风景的秀丽令我们陶醉.

sentences.en: The countryside lay as under some dread enchantment.
sentences.cn: 乡村好像躺在某种可怖的魔法之下.

sentences.en: The famous novel Wuthering Heights has its special enchantment in world literature.
sentences.cn: 名著《呼啸山庄》在世界文学史上有独特的魅力.

sentences.en: The quest for enchantment is a reason for astrology · s popularity.
sentences.cn: 长期对于魅惑的探索是星相学普及的原因.

sentences.en: The Surefooted enchantment now requires Fel Iron Rod ( was Runed Eternium Rod ).
sentences.cn: “靴子-稳固”附魔现在需要符文魔铁棒 ( 原来是符文恒金棒 ).

sentences.en: The wilderness campsite had its own peculiar enchantment.
sentences.cn: 野营地有其自身独特的魅力。

sentences.en: This is Beauty, who has the courage to rescue your son from the terrible enchantment.
sentences.cn: 这位就是美女, 她有勇气把你的儿子从可怕的妖术中解救出来.
